Home » 39P5 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5) » 1 Kusalattika, Tika » 1.20 Kusalattika, Ajjhattārammaṇattika » 1.20.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Kusalattika, Tika
Kusalattika, Ajjhattārammaṇattika
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
82.
283Kusalaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
284Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
83.
285Kusalaṃ bahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
286Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
